description:
net: refactor FileConn, FileListener and FilePacketConn tests

This CL replaces the previous redundant socket paramter tests with
new tests that do handoff between net.FileConn, os.File and net.Conn.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, fullung@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Can I ask that you give us a roadmap for all your net changes?

I think you should file issues for your goals, with dependencies between
the issues, and each CL should say "Fixes Issue nnnn" or "Update Issue nnn"
so we can figure out what you're working towards.

Right now it just looks like an endless series of changes, but we don't
know where you're going (but we're sure you know).




On Mon, May 20, 2013 at 3:03 AM, <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> ping
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8819044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8819044/>
